name: Superman OG
description: Superman OG is a must try for cannabis connoisseurs. The product of Tahoe OG and Bubba Kush, this hardy indica is both incredibly potent and exceptionally well bred. Following a long line of kush genetics, Superman OG provides a strong heavy body sensation and will put you to sleep in a hurry. While great for pain management, muscle spasms, and insomnia, Superman OGâ€™s potent sedative effects make it a strictly nighttime strain. The aroma of this indica is nearly as strong as its effects. Featuring a strong skunk-like scent and piney taste, Superman OG is extremely pungent and not for the novice patient.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Happy, Giggly, Euphoric, Stress, Pain, Headaches, Insomnia, Depression, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Anxious, Paranoid
